rows.label: qst700802_msg0001
rows.name: Everyone, can I have a word?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0002
rows.name: What is it, Shin?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0003
rows.name: Don't you think this is strange?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0004
rows.name:
Even though the city and roads are
nearby, it's still unnatural to have
so much trash in a forest like this.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0005
rows.name:
Hmm, for example, maybe a merchant or
traveler was attacked by a monster and
dropped their luggage to escape?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0006
rows.name:
If that were the case, the gate
guards would have noticed, so
that possibility is low.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0007
rows.name:
But why would someone come
all the way out here to
get rid of this stuff?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0008
rows.name: A purpose... there might not be one.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0009
rows.name: No purpose?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0010
rows.name:
Not "having to throw it
away," but "throwing it away"
itself being the purpose.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0011
rows.name: What does that mean?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0012
rows.name: In short, it's just a prank.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0013
rows.name: A prank?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0014
rows.name: But who would do such a thing...

rows.label: qst700802_msg0015
rows.name:
Indeed. If we had a little more
information, we might be able
to narrow down the culprit...

rows.label: qst700802_msg0016
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst700802_msg0017
rows.name: Huh? Everyone, look around!

rows.label: qst700802_msg0018
rows.name: It's... increased.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0019
rows.name:
But with this, it's clear
that someone is intentionally
scattering trash.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0020
rows.name: Anyway! Let's collect the trash again!
